name: Dev Tracker Workflow
description: A workflow to interact with the Telex Dev Tracker agent for managing development tasks, issues, and summaries.

input.description: The command or message to send to the Dev Tracker agent (e.g., 'add task Fix bug', 'show tasks', 'summary')

channelId.description: The channel ID for scoping tasks and issues

userId.description: The user ID for scoping tasks

output.description: The response from the Dev Tracker agent

actions.description: Any additional actions returned by the agent
